input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Trophy 1st Note Kazoo

Item specifications:
Comes in Red or Blue
Made of Durable Plastic
Hum Your Favorite Tunes
Real Instrument

Product description:
input_text.Response A: A unique and fun instrument for children, and adults can have fun too! The Trophy 1st Note Kazoo is a durable plastic kazoo that allows you to hum your favorite tunes and create your own band. They come in red or blue. 1st Note products are real instruments designed to introduce children to music. Encourage your child to play often - it's fun!
input_text.Response B: If you're looking for a fun and unique way to play your favorite tunes, look no further than the Trophy 1st Note Kazoo! This real instrument is made of durable plastic and comes in red or blue. So whether you're a seasoned musician or just starting out, the Trophy 1st Note Kazoo is sure to bring a little joy to your music-making.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A just seems disjointed and not very well written; it needs more flow. Response B is much better, but I would prefer the first line to be "Fun and unique way to HUM your favorite tunes" instead of PLAY your favorite tunes. It has more of a flow to it, however, so it is much better.
